text: Kazimierz Fajans (b. 27 May 1887 in Warsaw, Poland; d. 18 May 1975 in Ann Arbor, Michigan, USA) was a Polish physical chemist. He was a pioneer in the science of radioactivity working in the United States. Category:American chemists Category:1887 births Category:1975 deaths
title: Kazimierz Fajans
